      • publishEOF

        public static void publishEOF(Pipe[] pipe)
        This sends a poison pill. Any pipe that receives this pill shuts down and sends the pill to any pipes downstream of them
        Parameters:
        pipe - to send pill

      • publishWrites

        public static int publishWrites(Pipe pipe)

      • blockWriteFragment

        @Deprecated
public static void blockWriteFragment(Pipe pipe,
                                                   int messageTemplateLOC)
        Deprecated. 
        blocks until there is enough room for the requested fragment on the output ring. if the fragment needs a template id it is written and the workingHeadPosition is set to the first field.

      • tryReplication

        public static boolean tryReplication(Pipe pipe,
                                     long historicSlabPosition,
                                     int historicBlobPosition)
        Copy message previously sent and publish it again.

      • presumeWriteFragment

        public static void presumeWriteFragment(Pipe pipe,
                                        int fragmentId)
        We assume that the pipe has room and this was already checked earlier in the code. This method will call tryWriteFragment and if is not successful it will. 1. log an error so the developer can ensure this pipe is checked before calling this method. 2. continues to tryWrite until successful (may not return) this makes is a blocking call. This behaves as a blocking call if there is an error in the code up stream...

      • tryWriteFragment

        public static boolean tryWriteFragment(Pipe pipe,
                                       int fragmentId)
        Return true if there is room for the desired fragment in the output buffer. Places working head in place for the first field to be written (eg after the template Id, which is written by this method)

      • hasRoomForWrite

        public static boolean hasRoomForWrite(Pipe pipe)
        Check to see if specified pipe has room to write
        Parameters:
        pipe - to be checked
        Returns:
        true if pipe has room else false

      • hasRoomForFragmentOfSize

        public static boolean hasRoomForFragmentOfSize(Pipe pipe,
                                               int fragSize)
        Checks to see if specified pipe has room for a specific size of data
        Parameters:
        pipe - to be checked
        fragSize - size of data to add
        Returns:
        true if data fragment fits else false

      • wrappedUnstructuredLayoutBufferOpen

        public static ByteBuffer[] wrappedUnstructuredLayoutBufferOpen(Pipe<?> target,
                                                               int loc)
        Does not require tryWrite to be called first, we only need to check that there is room to write. This is for supporting buffer write to determine if we have data that can be written.

      • wrappedUnstructuredLayoutBufferOpen

        public static ByteBuffer[] wrappedUnstructuredLayoutBufferOpen(Pipe<?> target,
                                                               int maxLength,
                                                               int loc)
        Does not require tryWrite to be called first, we only need to check that there is room to write. This is for supporting buffer write to determine if we have data that can be written.
